name: Verse Therapy
headline: Connecting All Ages with Speech Language Pathologists
description: At Verse Therapy, we're dedicated to making quality speech therapy accessible for everyone by empowering speech-language pathologists (SLPs) to launch and grow their own independent practices. We help therapists focus on what they do best—providing compassionate, personalized care—by taking care of the administrative tasks that often lead to burnout. Through thoughtful marketing and partnerships with care organizations like rehab centers, we connect SLPs with individuals who need their expertise. Our AI-enabled back office streamlines insurance processing, scheduling, and documentation, reducing non-therapy overhead. We're now live in 10 states with over 35 dedicated therapists and are in-network with leading insurance providers, making it easier for clients to receive the support they need.

founders.name: Adam Steinle, Founder
founders.description: Former biomedical engineer, Goldman banker, and big tech PM going back to my roots as a founder in healthcare. Over 4 years at Facebook, I launched many successful products for Content Moderation, Community Growth, Gaming, and Creator Monetization.

founders.name: Danielle Yoesep, Founder
founders.description: Grew up interested in science, always thinking I'd become a doctor (immigrant parents lol) but realized in university that practicing medicine actually wasn't the way I wanted to make my impact. Stayed in science, wanted to be on the cutting edge, did some research developing platform technologies that enable the synthesis of novel molecules. I helped spin a company out based on the work and built it up from (mostly) scratch. We ended up getting acquired, and now I'm doing it all over again :)

founders.name: Shuying Zhang, Founder
founders.description: I have a mixed background of biomedical engineering and software development. Prior to founding Hona.ai, I was a software engineer at Google and Amazon. My past work was centered on Document AI, knowledge graph and cloud infrastructure.

## We accept many insurance plans

Why Choose Verse
## Communication is the core of what it is to be human. With our trusted, Verse-Vetted speech therapists, Verse empowers kids, families, and adults alike to move through life with confidence and clarity.
[Get Started Free](https://versetherapy.com/<https:/share.hsforms.com/2KN7eDJl0QJGk5DyLxnpoQgsg3kb>)
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2F838a2c36d7d5a84f16bac1749a8d4691c23a565a-1600x1141.jpg%3Fw%3D800%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
10+ Years of Experience
On average, our certified speech pathologists bring 10+ years of expertise and a proven track record of driving real progress in remote sessions.
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Fb6f6155905e4c59b6db51dcb813bbba9d3a71fca-1600x1141.jpg%3Fw%3D800%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
<1 Week to Start
You can begin your customized care plan in less than a week.
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Fda0f86fea4cd3b33c75c7d7af1628e158502f2eb-1600x1144.jpg%3Fw%3D800%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
<50% of Traditional Therapy Cost
On average, Verse clients pay less than half the cost of traditional therapy—thanks to our acceptance of many insurance plans and affordable cash rates.
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2F78ebd5932fddf431477ca36763251369e0996152-6589x4393.jpg%3Fw%3D800%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
1000+ Sessions Hosted
We're trusted by hundreds of clients and have hosted 1000+ sessions.
## Real Voices, Real Impact
Arrow
Arrow
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2F7d0c67c90312268ca08445af529259e973d3a439-512x512.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Sarah Sponseller
"Imagine the relief when you find someone who believes in you and is kind, supportive, and patient. That's what I found when I connected to my therapist on Verse. For anyone else wondering if they have found the right place, I know I found hope. I can't wait for my next session."
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2F65647861143505f048bc70c8f46bfbe198c879c3-560x665.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Liz Zyzo
"When I met with Liz for the initial session through Verse Therapy, I was blown away with how kind and thorough the service was. I had a lot of worries, being based in California-how will my child stay engaged through tele-therapy sessions, will her teacher be able to foster that attention from her that is needed for her to improve and will this program be effective? Let me tell you Verse Therapy and Liz were all that and more. Not only was my daughter interested and engaged but in times of difficulty Liz was so patient and encouraging fluidity throughout the session. Verse Therapy’s strategy to incorporate simple tips into our routine has put my child leaps and bounds ahead of where we started."
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2F9957060032c85a8031f508f5b4aaf195c1098284-560x665.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Paul McGill
"Paul has been working with my son for over a year now. He has always showed up with a smile. He has fully supported my son's needs. He has introduced my son to two different AAC applications. Paul is very knowledgeable and is an open book to support his client and parents. He has answered all of my endless questions. He is transparent, trustworthy, and gently pushes the child out of their comfort zone."
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Faae52c662352939ba8095254e7fb9e3a1ed0bbe1-512x512.png%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Julie Meyerowitz
“As a result of working with Julie, our daughter little by little started saying more and more sounds. She helped facilitate this process and helped our daughter realize what she was capable of, one sound at a time. Now, our daughter doesn't stop talking all day long!” 
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Fa6fad7cf7f93a74d81e95a2c764998e2db457aa4-512x512.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Kristen Riley
“My son has been working with Ms. Kristen for a few months and I am blown away with the results, confidence and his eagerness to partcipate. She goes above and beyond to be fun, prompt, engaging and it’s something that my child is eager to do and is so beneficial for him. She is amazing at also providing support for the parents and we appreciate her so much. I cannot stress how happy we are that we found her and that my son has the pleasure to work with her.” 
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Fe6ff356fbb9a666857099724b6d7060884389075-480x480.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Stephanie Rich
“We have seen genuine care for our son’s progress in the short time we have worked with her. Our son is a very busy little boy who is always all over the place. Stephanie is patient and accommodating to what may work best to help our son. Knowing that we are our son’s primary “therapist” since speech therapy is weekly, we appreciate her time teaching us additional tools for working with our little one at home each week. Our family has been part of his growth. We have seen such progress and will always be grateful!”
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2F7d0c67c90312268ca08445af529259e973d3a439-512x512.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Sarah Sponseller
"I'm very happy. My voice is sounding a lot better. I think that the Verse set up is wonderful and I'm happy to see my progress. Other speech places have said there is nothing I can do, but Sarah has helped me and given me more than anywhere else I've tried." 
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2F65647861143505f048bc70c8f46bfbe198c879c3-560x665.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Liz Zyzo
"Liz, our family is forever grateful for you. Thank you for going above and beyond for my child. It wasn't always easy with my son but you never gave up and kept a positive attitude through it all. You taught my son in a way he could understand. In the beginning my son wasn't able to ask his teachers for help, due to them not understanding him BUT now a year later and thanks to you Liz, he can have a mini conversation. Perfect for a 3 year old. I would recommend Liz to any other parent trying to better their child’s speech."
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Faae52c662352939ba8095254e7fb9e3a1ed0bbe1-512x512.png%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Julie Meyerowitz
“As a result of working with Julie my children have greatly improved in everyday speech and now speak more clearly. More family members and friends understand them while they are speaking, telling stories of their favorite things or trying to explain something.”
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Fe6ff356fbb9a666857099724b6d7060884389075-480x480.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
For Stephanie Rich
“Stephanie is very thorough and helped my son stay focused and on task, all while making therapy fun and keeping him engaged. She truly cares, and this is evident because she makes a point to give attention to what my son’s specific needs are! He often finds therapy difficult to sit through, but with Stephanie, I noted him looking forward to sessions, seeing him enthusiastic during them and excited to complete a task with her. I was very impressed with this and was extremely happy with his progress. Her methods worked out very quickly and well for him!”

## How It Works

01
Find a speech therapist.
Choose from our team of Verse-Vetted SLPs based on your needs and insurance coverage.
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2F0fa1949300a31d1070e922ea78407e3f5c296cf8-1600x1598.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)

Schedule an evaluation.
Book a session instantly to work with your SLP to create a personalized therapy plan tailored to you.
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Feda42865e0798fb4098fe3808ea66cf66f02040f-5504x8256.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
03
Start your journey.
We’ll fit your schedule and track your progress, with the comfort of knowing your SLP is available for support at any time.
Why We're Better
Verse
Others
01
Wait Time
You can start therapy within days.
Long wait times. You might wait months, or even years, especially in regions with few therapists.
02
Flexibility
You get therapy on your schedule, from the comfort of your home.
Inconvenient scheduling. You have to adjust your schedule and commute.
03
Pricing
Starts at $95 per session and $95 per evaluation for private pay, with coverage options through major insurances.
Higher costs. Private pay sessions often cost $100 to $250 with evaluations costing up to $400.
04
Access to Experts
More expert options. You're not limited by location. Choose your own therapist and switch to others that fit your needs.
Limited options. You might have to settle for whichever local providers are available.
05
Ongoing support
Text your SLP for help outside of sessions.
Limited support between sessions, with communication often restricted to scheduled appointments.
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Fcb12c35386ad5dc68d96cd94bb1c896586310751-1996x1328.jpg%3Fw%3D1600%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)

## Our Services
For AdultsFor Kids & Families
We cater to every communication concern with an expert team of Verse-Vetted speech-language pathologists.
[View All Services](https://versetherapy.com/</services>)
Arrow
Arrow
Expert Speech Sound Disorder Treatment & Therapy
Improve clarity and confidence with expert speech sound therapy. Discover personalized treatment for speech sound disorders at Verse Therapy today!
Voice Disorder Treatments
Personalized, evidence-based care designed to improve vocal clarity and confidence
Social Communication Therapy: Disorder Treatment
Communication training for autism spectrum disorder, pragmatic language, and more 
Personalized Cognitive Communication Therapy
Improving executive functioning post-stroke, TBI, and more
Gender Affirming Voice Therapy
Voice training for gender identity
Fluency Disorders Treatment & Therapy
Overcoming stuttering and cluttering 
Aphasia Treatment: Speech Therapy
Personalized, evidence-based care designed to help you regain communication skills and confidence.
Accent Modification Therapy
Tailored accent training for professional and personal goals 
Dysarthria Treatment: Speech Therapy
Articulation for conditions like cerebral palsy, Parkinson's, and Huntington's
Public Speaking & Professional Communication Therapy
Personalized, evidence-based strategies to enhance your confidence, clarity, and impact in professional and public speaking scenarios.

Pricing
## Simple and Transparent Pricing
We provide care on a pay-per-session basis—no bundles, no hidden fees. We also make insurance easy with clear cost estimates and benefits checks so you always know what to expect.
[Book Free Consultation](https://versetherapy.com/<https:/share.hsforms.com/2KN7eDJl0QJGk5DyLxnpoQgsg3kb>)
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Fe176fa52a8d5aa274f55f96bd4a947ec90c4efeb-1600x971.jpg%3Fw%3D800%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
Self-Pay Options
Starting at $95
Recurring Session
Flexible scheduling to suit your routine. We accept HSA and FSA payments and support out-of-network billing for your convenience.
Starting at $95
Initial Evaluation
A comprehensive session to understand your or your child's needs and create a personalized care plan.
![Verse](https://versetherapy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Frmdche6f%2Fproduction%2Fcce30b9cb9bd502714a0389b96cfdda66f10a662-1600x971.jpg%3Fw%3D800%26q%3D100%26fit%3Dmax%26auto%3Dformat&w=3840&q=80)
Insurance Coverage
Rates vary according to your plan
  * We accept multiple insurance plans.
  * Our team handles eligibility and benefits checks.
  * You can use our calculator to estimate your care costs.


[Get Started](https://versetherapy.com/<https:/share.hsforms.com/2KN7eDJl0QJGk5DyLxnpoQgsg3kb>)
## Frequently Asked Questions
### Why Verse?
Plus
We understand the emotion and challenges that come with seeking speech therapy, so we’ve created a platform that brings intentionality to efficiency, cost, flexibility, and support – eliminating wait times, pain points, and financial burden.
### Can I switch therapists if I feel it’s not the right fit?
Plus
Absolutely. Your comfort and progress are our priorities. If you feel you need a change, we'll work with you to find a better match among our team of therapists.
### How do you match me with the right therapist?
Plus
Our unique matching process considers:
- Your specific communication challenge
- The specialist's area of expertise
- Your preferences (e.g., session times, therapy style) 
This ensures you work with a therapist who is not only qualified but also the best fit for your needs.
### How do I communicate with my therapist?
Plus
You can message your therapist and request appointments at any time through our client portal.
### How long does a speech therapy program typically last?
Plus
The duration of speech therapy varies for each client and depends on factors such as: - The specific communication challenge - Frequency of therapy sessions - Home practice consistency - Personal goals and milestones - Any underlying medical conditions
Your assigned specialist will provide a more accurate timeline after the initial assessment. Depending on the care plan, you can expect 1-2 meetings per week.
### How much does therapy cost?
Plus
Our therapy sessions are affordably priced at $95 each. Assessments, which provide a comprehensive evaluation, cost $95 as well. We also offer superbills, which you can submit to your insurance for reimbursement. Additionally, we are becoming in-network with major insurance plans across the country to make our services even more accessible.

Why Choose Verse
## Communication is the core of what it is to be human. With our trusted, Verse-Vetted speech therapists, Verse empowers kids, families, and adults alike to move through life with confidence and clarity.
Get Started Free⟨9⟩
![Verse⟨20⟩]
10+ Years of Experience
On average, our certified speech pathologists bring 10+ years of expertise and a proven track record of driving real progress in remote sessions.
![Verse⟨21⟩]
<1 Week to Start
You can begin your customized care plan in less than a week.
![Verse⟨22⟩]
<50% of Traditional Therapy Cost
On average, Verse clients pay less than half the cost of traditional therapy—thanks to our acceptance of many insurance plans and affordable cash rates.

1000+ Sessions Hosted

## Real Voices, Real Impact
Arrow
Arrow
![Verse⟨24⟩]
For Sarah Sponseller
"Imagine the relief when you find someone who believes in you and is kind, supportive, and patient. That's what I found when I connected to my therapist on Verse. For anyone else wondering if they have found the right place, I know I found hope. I can't wait for my next session."
![Verse⟨25⟩]
For Liz Zyzo
"When I met with Liz for the initial session through Verse Therapy, I was blown away with how kind and thorough the service was. I had a lot of worries, being based in California-how will my child stay engaged through tele-therapy sessions, will her teacher be able to foster that attention from her that is needed for her to improve and will this program be effective? Let me tell you Verse Therapy and Liz were all that and more. Not only was my daughter interested and engaged but in times of difficulty Liz was so patient and encouraging fluidity throughout the session. Verse Therapy’s strategy to incorporate simple tips into our routine has put my child leaps and bounds ahead of where we started."
![Verse⟨26⟩]
For Paul McGill
"Paul has been working with my son for over a year now. He has always showed up with a smile. He has fully supported my son's needs. He has introduced my son to two different AAC applications. Paul is very knowledgeable and is an open book to support his client and parents. He has answered all of my endless questions. He is transparent, trustworthy, and gently pushes the child out of their comfort zone."
![Verse⟨27⟩]
For Julie Meyerowitz
“As a result of working with Julie, our daughter little by little started saying more and more sounds. She helped facilitate this process and helped our daughter realize what she was capable of, one sound at a time. Now, our daughter doesn't stop talking all day long!” 
![Verse⟨28⟩]
For Kristen Riley
“My son has been working with Ms. Kristen for a few months and I am blown away with the results, confidence and his eagerness to partcipate. She goes above and beyond to be fun, prompt, engaging and it’s something that my child is eager to do and is so beneficial for him. She is amazing at also providing support for the parents and we appreciate her so much. I cannot stress how happy we are that we found her and that my son has the pleasure to work with her.” 
![Verse⟨29⟩]
For Stephanie Rich
“We have seen genuine care for our son’s progress in the short time we have worked with her. Our son is a very busy little boy who is always all over the place. Stephanie is patient and accommodating to what may work best to help our son. Knowing that we are our son’s primary “therapist” since speech therapy is weekly, we appreciate her time teaching us additional tools for working with our little one at home each week. Our family has been part of his growth. We have seen such progress and will always be grateful!”
![Verse⟨24⟩]
For Sarah Sponseller
"I'm very happy. My voice is sounding a lot better. I think that the Verse set up is wonderful and I'm happy to see my progress. Other speech places have said there is nothing I can do, but Sarah has helped me and given me more than anywhere else I've tried." 
![Verse⟨25⟩]
For Liz Zyzo
"Liz, our family is forever grateful for you. Thank you for going above and beyond for my child. It wasn't always easy with my son but you never gave up and kept a positive attitude through it all. You taught my son in a way he could understand. In the beginning my son wasn't able to ask his teachers for help, due to them not understanding him BUT now a year later and thanks to you Liz, he can have a mini conversation. Perfect for a 3 year old. I would recommend Liz to any other parent trying to better their child’s speech."
![Verse⟨27⟩]
For Julie Meyerowitz
“As a result of working with Julie my children have greatly improved in everyday speech and now speak more clearly. More family members and friends understand them while they are speaking, telling stories of their favorite things or trying to explain something.”
![Verse⟨29⟩]
For Stephanie Rich
“Stephanie is very thorough and helped my son stay focused and on task, all while making therapy fun and keeping him engaged. She truly cares, and this is evident because she makes a point to give attention to what my son’s specific needs are! He often finds therapy difficult to sit through, but with Stephanie, I noted him looking forward to sessions, seeing him enthusiastic during them and excited to complete a task with her. I was very impressed with this and was extremely happy with his progress. Her methods worked out very quickly and well for him!”

## How It Works
Find a Speech Therapist⟨8⟩
![Verse⟨34⟩]
01
Find a speech therapist.
Choose from our team of Verse-Vetted SLPs based on your needs and insurance coverage.
![Verse⟨35⟩]
02
Schedule an evaluation.
Book a session instantly to work with your SLP to create a personalized therapy plan tailored to you.
![Verse⟨36⟩]
03

Why We're Better
Verse
Others
01
Wait Time
You can start therapy within days.
Long wait times. You might wait months, or even years, especially in regions with few therapists.
02
Flexibility
You get therapy on your schedule, from the comfort of your home.
Inconvenient scheduling. You have to adjust your schedule and commute.
03
Pricing
Starts at $95 per session and $95 per evaluation for private pay, with coverage options through major insurances.
Higher costs. Private pay sessions often cost $100 to $250 with evaluations costing up to $400.
04
Access to Experts
More expert options. You're not limited by location. Choose your own therapist and switch to others that fit your needs.
Limited options. You might have to settle for whichever local providers are available.
05
Ongoing support
Text your SLP for help outside of sessions.
Limited support between sessions, with communication often restricted to scheduled appointments.

Expert Speech Sound Disorder Treatment & Therapy
Improve clarity and confidence with expert speech sound therapy. Discover personalized treatment for speech sound disorders at Verse Therapy today!
Voice Disorder Treatments
Personalized, evidence-based care designed to improve vocal clarity and confidence
Social Communication Therapy: Disorder Treatment
Communication training for autism spectrum disorder, pragmatic language, and more 
Personalized Cognitive Communication Therapy
Improving executive functioning post-stroke, TBI, and more
Gender Affirming Voice Therapy
Voice training for gender identity
Fluency Disorders Treatment & Therapy
Overcoming stuttering and cluttering 
Aphasia Treatment: Speech Therapy
Personalized, evidence-based care designed to help you regain communication skills and confidence.
Accent Modification Therapy
Tailored accent training for professional and personal goals 
Dysarthria Treatment: Speech Therapy
Articulation for conditions like cerebral palsy, Parkinson's, and Huntington's
Public Speaking & Professional Communication Therapy
Personalized, evidence-based strategies to enhance your confidence, clarity, and impact in professional and public speaking scenarios.

We provide care on a pay-per-session basis—no bundles, no hidden fees. We also make insurance easy with clear cost estimates and benefits checks so you always know what to expect.

## Frequently Asked Questions
### Why Verse?
Plus
We understand the emotion and challenges that come with seeking speech therapy, so we’ve created a platform that brings intentionality to efficiency, cost, flexibility, and support – eliminating wait times, pain points, and financial burden.
### Can I switch therapists if I feel it’s not the right fit?
Plus
Absolutely. Your comfort and progress are our priorities. If you feel you need a change, we'll work with you to find a better match among our team of therapists.
### How do you match me with the right therapist?
Plus
Our unique matching process considers:
- Your specific communication challenge
- The specialist's area of expertise
- Your preferences (e.g., session times, therapy style) 
This ensures you work with a therapist who is not only qualified but also the best fit for your needs.
### How do I communicate with my therapist?
Plus
You can message your therapist and request appointments at any time through our client portal.
### How long does a speech therapy program typically last?
Plus
The duration of speech therapy varies for each client and depends on factors such as: - The specific communication challenge - Frequency of therapy sessions - Home practice consistency - Personal goals and milestones - Any underlying medical conditions
Your assigned specialist will provide a more accurate timeline after the initial assessment. Depending on the care plan, you can expect 1-2 meetings per week.
### How much does therapy cost?
Plus

We also offer superbills, which you can submit to your insurance for reimbursement. generated_description:
**Verse Therapy: A New Era in Speech Therapy**

Founded in 2024, Verse Therapy is redefining the landscape of speech therapy, driven by the mission of connecting all ages with speech-language pathologists (SLPs). The company is headquartered in San Francisco and is a proud participant of the Y Combinator Batch W24. With a small, dedicated team of just three employees, Verse Therapy is currently operating in ten states and has onboarded over 35 therapists.

### The Vision

At its core, Verse Therapy seeks to make quality speech therapy accessible to everyone. They empower SLPs to establish and grow their practices, allowing them to focus on what they do best: providing compassionate and personalized care. By taking care of the often-overwhelming administrative tasks—think scheduling, insurance processing, and documentation—Verse Therapy significantly reduces the burnout that many therapists experience.

### How It Works

The platform features an AI-enabled back office that streamlines the business side of therapy. This innovation not only facilitates insurance processing and scheduling, but also enhances documentation practices, enabling therapists to prioritize client interaction. For clients, the process is straightforward: you can expect to start therapy in a matter of days instead of months. 

### Affordable and Convenient

Verse Therapy is making strides in reducing the costs associated with speech therapy. Clients typically pay less than half the cost of traditional therapies, as they work with a wide array of insurance providers. Furthermore, they offer self-pay options starting at just $95 per session.

### Services Offered

Verse Therapy caters to a broad range of speech-related issues, including:
- Speech sound disorders
- Voice disorders
- Fluency disorders
- Cognitive-communication therapy (essential for those recovering from strokes and brain injuries)
- Gender-affirming voice therapy
- Public speaking and professional communication strategies

Whether for children or adults, the platform's therapists are equipped to manage various communication challenges. 

### Client-Centric Approach

One of the standout features of Verse Therapy is its commitment to ongoing support. Therapists are accessible outside of scheduled sessions, allowing clients to reach out for additional help when they need it most. This level of accessibility and flexibility is a notable differentiator in the therapy space. 

### Conclusion

With a clear mission, a smart use of technology, and a focus on affordable care, Verse Therapy is set to change how individuals access speech therapy. By placing therapists and their clients first, they are championing a new paradigm where therapy is not only effective but also approachable for everyone, regardless of age or background. 

For more information, check out their website at [Verse Therapy](https://versetherapy.com).
